Articles.Content:
Hi console players - I've had this game for a month, and it has deleted my game play 4 times, three in the past 7 days.  I'm feeling incredibly cheated out of my money.  Can anyone help me figure out what the problem is?  Thanks in advance for suggestions!

Edited August 2, 2016 by Jofu17

41 minutes ago, Jofu17 said:

Hi console players - I've had this game for a month, and it has deleted my game play 4 times, three in the past 7 days.  I'm feeling incredibly cheated out of my money.  Can anyone help me figure out what the problem is?  Thanks in advance for suggestions!

the console version currently has a bug that can cause the game to crash,  and can sometimes corrupt the save file. this is a known issue and many are waiting for a patch to come out and fix it.   the lastest word is that update is in testing, as per a fb post on the flying tiger page.

some people have taken to backing up the save file on a USB stick in the mean time
